metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Everett. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Perry J Grant, AAMS®
Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Peter Smart, CFP®

heroDescription: Everett, Washington, is a vibrant city located in Snohomish County, known for its rich maritime history and proximity to Seattle.
landscapeDescription: Everett's economy is diverse, driven by aerospace, manufacturing, and healthcare. The city benefits from its strategic location near major transportation hubs.
uniqueNeeds: Everett requires investment in infrastructure and sustainable development to support its growing population and economy.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Everett's aerospace focus poses risks if demand fluctuates. Housing prices are rising, indicating potential bubble risks. Prepare for flooding and diversify economically.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Everett's economy grew by 3.5% last year, driven by aerospace and tech sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median household income in Everett is $76,000, reflecting a stable economic environment.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Everett are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and investment strategies.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Everett's cost of living is 10% higher than the national average, driven by housing and transportation costs.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Everett's housing market is competitive, with home prices rising 8% year-over-year, indicating strong demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Everett's business climate is favorable, with incentives for tech startups and established industries.
